name: Lord Zombie
description: The Lord Zombie is a powerful and malevolent undead creature, showcasing typical traits of undead beings. It possesses natural armor and exudes an aura of decay, making it a fearsome sight in battle.
memorable: Its ability to rise from death and control lesser undead makes the Lord Zombie a memorable and dangerous foe.
goals: The Lord Zombie seeks to dominate through fear, using its necromantic powers to control other undead and eliminate living threats.
relations: It can command lesser zombies and may be encountered alongside other undead.
environment: Typically found in graveyards, ruins, or areas steeped in dark magic.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage, with legendary resistance allowing it to defy failed saving throws.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage, which bypasses many of its defenses.
attacks: The Lord Zombie can make two slam attacks or a life-draining attack that reduces the maximum hit points of its target.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to raise slain foes as zombies under its control, significantly bolstering its numbers in combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 60 feet, enhancing its perception in dim light.
skills: Has a good perception skill, making it adept at noticing hidden or stealthy creatures.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on saving throws it would normally fail.
Stench ability can poison non-undead creatures nearby.
Undead Fortitude enables it to survive a lethal blow if not dealt radiant damage.
Can control up to twenty zombies at one time.
Ability to command zombies telepathically within a mile.
